jodd.mail

Class Pop3Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.MailServer<ReceiveMailSession>
      • jodd.mail.Pop3Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pop3SslServer

    public class Pop3Server
extends MailServer<ReceiveMailSession>
    Represents simple plain POP server for sending emails.
